title: Why are there so many steps in building a blog? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many moving parts about blogs: writing, editing, pictures/photos, graphs, infographics, SEO optimization, tags, selecting plug-ins, design of the page, linking and so on. There are just a few of the essential components that are the backbone of a successful blog. Also, you are navigating between Web pages and articles, whether you store them in Word or Google docs. This takes time and energy, especially if you use WordPress, which has a lot of bells and whistles - and is an effetive platform. A blog is a big thing. You can’t just go and join some random website, give yourself a random name and start writing and publishing right away, without a second thought. On the other hand, you shouldn’t make it a bigger deal than it its - for example, don’t spend years trying to come up with a niche. It’s a difficult choice, yeah, but don’t make the whole process longer than it needs to be.
